title: ZOMBIES: MOANS & GROANS VOICES PACK1
description: Get ready to unleash the undead! The “ZOMBIES: MOANS & GROANS VOICES PACK1” is your gateway to a world of terror.
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


ZOMBIES: MOANS & GROANS VOICES PACK1


Are you ready to immerse your players in spine-chilling zombie encounters? Look no further than the “ZOMBIES: MOANS & GROANS VOICES PACK1.” This meticulously crafted audio asset pack is designed to elevate your zombie-themed video games and other fictional content to new levels of horror and suspense.


Key Features:


Seven Distinct Tonalities: Our pack includes a diverse range of zombie voices, each with its own eerie tonality. From guttural growls to haunting whispers, you’ll find the perfect fit for every undead character.


We’ve used the same set of voice recordings to create these seven unique tones.


High-Quality Audio Specs:

  • 96kHz/24-bit: For audiophiles and those seeking unparalleled fidelity.
  • 48kHz/24-bit: A balance between quality and file size.
  • 44.1kHz/24-bit: Standard CD-quality audio.


Versatile Use Cases:


Game Soundtracks: Integrate these moans and groans seamlessly into your game’s soundtrack. Whether it’s a dark alley, an abandoned hospital, or a graveyard, these zombie voices will send shivers down players’ spines.


Ambient Effects: Set the mood with ambient audio loops. Imagine players exploring a decaying laboratory, surrounded by distant zombie moans echoing through the corridors.


Character Customization: Assign specific tones to different zombie types. The lumbering brute might have a deep, resonant groan, while the agile crawler uses a higher-pitched rasp.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL SOUNDS 769 

(769 IN EACH AUDIO SPEC)

Category Folders:-

  • Tone1_Zombies = 109 Sounds 
  • Tone2_Zombies = 110 Sounds
  • Tone3_Zombies = 110 Sounds
  • Tone4_Zombies = 110 Sounds
  • Tone5_Zombies = 110 Sounds
  • Tone6_Zombies = 110 Sounds
  • Tone7_Zombies = 110 Sounds


Number of Audio Waves: 769 + 769 + 769

Number of Audio Cues: 769 + 769 + 769

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz/24-bit + 48kHz/24-bit + 44.1kHz/24-bit

Minutes of audio provided: 56:10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
